CmdLine: apt-get update && apt-get install -y tmux git vim-nox wget
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: cd /root && git clone --recursive https://github.com/FrancoisBillant/dotfiles.git && cp -r /root/dotfiles/. /root && rm -Rf /root/scripts && rm -Rf /root/dotfiles && rm -f /root/README.md
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: cd /opt && mkdir /opt/jdk && cd /opt/jdk && wget --no-check-certificate --no-cookies --header "Cookie: oraclelicense=accept-securebackup-cookie" http://download.oracle.com/otn-pub/java/jdk/8u161-b12/2f38c3b165be4555a1fa6e98c45e0808/jdk-8u161-linux-x64.tar.gz && tar -xvzf jdk-*
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: apt-get update && apt-get install -y libswt-gtk-3-jni libswt-gtk-3-java
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: cd /opt && wget http://www.mirrorservice.org/sites/download.eclipse.org/eclipseMirror/technology/epp/downloads/release/oxygen/2/eclipse-java-oxygen-2-linux-gtk-x86_64.tar.gz && tar -xvzf eclipse-* && rm eclipse-*
Commands.Name: run
